TopicTitle: Add "Toggle Lights" to Hitchhiker and Mobile Lab

Articles.Content: Hitchhiker storage unit and Mobile Processing Lab have windows but no "Toggle Lights" actions. Please add them.
I'm almost certain that neither the Mk1 Command Pod nor the Mk1 Lander can, wait... Does the Mk1-2 Command Pod even have lights for its windows?   Lights everywhere where they arent, please!
I second this! I wish all the crew quarters could light up! It's so nice with the new models.
